tags: None
review: My wife git diagnosed with primary Dengue infection. Dr Deepa listened to all the problems very patiently and closely monitored all the vitals. She assured us to not worry and just keep resting and having fluids. My wife has fully recovered in 10 days without the need of hospitalisation. Thanku Dr Deepa.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Was suffering from cough cold from last 7-8 days..Also was having severe ear pain etc. due to infection
Doctor did the needful checkup and provided suitable medication 
Got better by having the first dose itself and now feeling better
Consultation fees if would have been bit less, more people could be benefited and get opportunity of this better treatment

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited the doctor for stomach pain/worms..and without any first medication doctor asked me do lots of test including blood, stool ultra sound to find the issue from root **** ** ********* .....when I visited her aging with the test report after 2 days...she just sending the report in WhatsApp to someone else and told me that will update you...*** ** * ******** *************** **** **** *** *** ***** *** **** *********** ****** **** ***** *************** **** * ******* *** *** ** ***** ************ ******** *** ******* ** *** ********* **** *** *** ** **** ********* ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ** ***** *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ** ******** ** ********** My full family including my 4 yrs old daughter is under her medication and I have complete trust on her consultation. She doesnt give you lot of medicine, listen your problem, doesnt ask too much of unnecessary  questions and give the treatment.I also go for my daughter to her because she has experience to treat kids also. Very happy with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have consulted Dr.Deepa multiple times in the past 2 yrs. *** ** **** * **** ** * ********* ** ******** *** **** *** **** *** ** *** *********** ***** ****** **********She responds on Whatsapp for query or assistance even after the consultation.
Best part is she gives a lot of confidence to the patient

review: Visited the doctor to get my annual health checkup reports reviewed. She went through the reports thoroughly, explained the issues, enquired about my lifestyle and suggested some medication and next steps.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to say Dr Deepa Rawal won’t explain the issue or the medicines prescribed. She should be able to explain the patient what is the medicine being used and how much dosage being used. She won’t respond on WhatsApp just for the sake giving numbers on prescription does not help patient anyways. She writes so many medicines. I googled and figured out what each medicine is being used for . Also I would like to highlight that Appollo Clinic Electronic City got very bad  administration **** ***** ******** No proper token for patients and patients in that condition being elderly or young patients have to figure out themselves.  * ***** ********* *** **** ******* **** *** *** ***** ****** **** ****** ******* **** ************** **** * * ****** ** **** ***** *** **** ***** *** *********

review: Dr Deepa Rawal is one of the few doctors who is very friendly .she listen carefully and explain the course of treatment.she respond promptly on the what's app if any problem comes or any suggestions required during the course of treatment.There is the clarity for her treatment. She even explained why and which test are important for the treatment.I strongly recommend her
